error.message: Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Interface Drupal\membership\Entity\MembershipTypeInterface extends deprecated interface Drupal\entity\Entity\RevisionableEntityBundleInterface. Deprecated in favor of \Drupal\Core\Entity\RevisionableEntityBundleInterface. Use that instead.

Parameter $entity_query of method Drupal\membership\MembershipManagerService::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.

Class Drupal\membership\Plugin\ConfigurableMembershipProviderBase implements deprecated interface Drupal\Component\Plugin\ConfigurablePluginInterface: Drupal\Component\Plugin\ConfigurablePluginInterface is deprecated in Drupal 8.7.0 and will be removed before Drupal 9.0.0. You should implement ConfigurableInterface and/or DependentPluginInterface directly as needed. If you implement ConfigurableInterface you may choose to implement ConfigurablePluginInterface in Drupal 8 as well for maximum compatibility, however this must be removed prior to Drupal 9.

Parameter $entityQuery of method Drupal\membership\Plugin\MembershipProviderManager::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Call to deprecated constant NODE_PUBLISHED: Deprecated in drupal:8.?.? and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\node\NodeInterface::PUBLISHED instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to membership.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
